Ð¡reate payment link
POST
https://uex.us/api/merchant/generate-payment-url
Creates a payment link (URL) for a specified order or product. This can be embedded on a merchant website to redirect customers to a UEX-hosted payment page.
Request

Headers

Authorization
string
Bearer {{token}}
Body



application/json

order
string
required
Example:
1809001
item_name
string
required
Example:
Iphone 16 pro max 256GB
amount
string
required
Example:
4
success_url
string
required
Example:
https://yourwebsite.com/order/1809001/success
failure_url
string
required
Example:
https://yourwebsite.com/order/1809001/failed

200
OK

curl --request POST \
  --url https://uex.us/api/merchant/generate-payment-url \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: ' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "order": "1809001",
  "item_name": "Iphone 16 pro max 256GB",
  "amount": "4",
  "success_url": "https://yourwebsite.com/order/1809001/success",
  "failure_url": "https://yourwebsite.com/order/1809001/failed"
}'
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "redirect_url": "https://uex.us/payment/select-gateway?"
  }
}
